00002 #define RF22_H_

00004 #define  RFM22_NIRQ_PORT  PIND
00005 #define  RFM22_NIRQ_PIN   PD2

00007 /* RFM22 register definitions */
00008 /* register 00, device type */
00009 #define DT         0  /* DT[4:0] */
00010 
00011 /* register 01, device version */
00012 #define VC         0  /* VC[4:0] */
00013 
00014 /* register 02, device status */
00015 #define CPS        0  /* CPS[1:0] */
00016 #define HEADERR    4
00017 #define RXFFEM     5
00018 #define FFUNFL     6
00019 #define FFOVL      7
00020 
00021 /* register 03, interrupt status 1 */
00022 #define ICRCERROR  0
00023 #define IPKVALID   1
00024 #define IPKSENT    2
00025 #define IEXT       3
00026 #define IRXFFAFULL 4
00027 #define ITXFFAEM   5
00028 #define ITXFFAFULL 6
00029 #define IFFERR     7
00030 
00031 /* register 04, interrupt status 2 */
00032 #define IPOR       0
00033 #define ICHIPRDY   1
00034 #define ILBD       2
00035 #define IWUT       3
00036 #define IRSSI      4
00037 #define IPREAINVAL 5
00038 #define IPREAVAL   6
00039 #define ISWDET     7
00040 
00041 /* register 05, interrupt enable 1 */
00042 #define ENCRCERROR  0
00043 #define ENPKVALID   1
00044 #define ENPKSENT    2
00045 #define ENEXT       3
00046 #define ENRXFFAFULL 4
00047 #define ENTXFFAEM   5
00048 #define ENTXFFAFULL 6
00049 #define ENFFERR     7
00050 
00051 /* register 06, interrupt enable 2 */
00052 #define ENPOR       0
00053 #define ENCHIPRDY   1
00054 #define ENLBD       2
00055 #define ENWUT       3
00056 #define ENRSSI      4
00057 #define ENPREAINVAL 5
00058 #define ENPREAVAL   6
00059 #define ENSWDET     7
00060 
00061 /* register 07, operating and function control 1 */
00062 #define XTON        0
00063 #define PLLON       1
00064 #define RXON        2
00065 #define TXON        3
00066 #define X32KSEL     4
00067 #define ENWT        5
00068 #define ENLBD7      6
00069 #define SWRES       7
00070 
00071 /* register 08, operating and function control 2 */
00072 #define FFCLRTX     0
00073 #define FFCLRRX     1
00074 #define ENLDM       2
00075 #define AUTOTX      3
00076 #define RXMPK       4
00077 #define ANTDIV      5  /* ANTDIV[2:0] */
00078 
00079 /* register 09, crystal load capacitance */
00080 #define XLC         0  /* XLC[6..0] */
00081 #define XTALSHFT    7
00082 
00083 /* register 0A, microcontroller clock output */
00084 #define MCLK        0  /* MCLK[2:0] */
00085 #define ENLFC       3
00086 #define CLKT        4  /* CLKT[1:0] */
00087 
00088 /* register 0B, GPIO0 configuration */
00089 #define GPOI0       0  /* GPIO[4:0] */
00090 #define PUP0        5
00091 #define GPIO0DRV    6  /* GPIODRV[1:0] */
00092 
00093 /* register 0C, GPIO1 configuration */
00094 #define GPOI1       0  /* GPIO[4:0] */
00095 #define PUP1        5
00096 #define GPIO1DRV    6  /* GPIODRV[1:0] */
00097 
00098 /* register 0D, GPIO2 configuration */
00099 #define GPOI2       0  /* GPIO[4:0] */
00100 #define PUP2        5
00101 #define GPIO2DRV    6  /* GPIODRV[1:0] */
00102 
00103 /* register 0E, IO port configuration */
00104 #define DIO0        0
00105 #define DIO1        1
00106 #define DIO2        2
00107 #define ITSD0       3
00108 #define EXTITST     4  /* EXTITST [2:0] */
00109 
00110 /* register 0F, IO ADC configuration */
00111 #define ADCGAIN     0  /* ADCGAIN[1:0] */
00112 #define ADCREF      2  /* ADCREF[1:0] */
00113 #define ADCSEL      4  /* ADCSEL[2:0] */
00114 #define ADCSTART    7
00115 
00116 /* register 30, data access control */
00117 #define CRC         0  /* CRC[1:0] */
00118 #define ENCRC       2
00119 #define ENPACTX     3
00120 #define SKIP2PH     4
00121 #define CRCDONLY    5
00122 #define LSBFRST     6
00123 #define ENPACRX     7
00124 
00125 
00126 void     rf22_init   (void);
00127 uint8_t  rf22_cmd    (uint8_t  addr, uint8_t val);
00128 
00129 #define rf22_write(addr,val) { \
00130 rf22_cmd ( addr|0x80, val); }
00131 
00132 #define rf22_read(addr)  \
00133 rf22_cmd ( addr, 0)
00134 
00135 #endif /* RF22.h */
